MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: このコレクションの項目の容量の事前に割り当てられたコレクション。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is **8**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一方、プロパティは、このコレクションに項目を格納するための事前割り当て済みのスロットの数を表す、プロパティがコレクション内の現在のアイテムの実際の数を表します。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 値の値としてサイズ以上では常にです。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 新たに追加のコレクションに項目がコレクションの容量、容量を超えるコレクションのカウントをときには新しく追加したコレクション アイテムに合わせて自動的に増加します。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. コレクションの容量を増やすには、パフォーマンスとメモリのオーバーヘッドが生じますスロットの追加のコレクションを割り当てる必要があります。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用して、コレクション アイテムの合計または最大数があらかじめわかっている場合にコレクションの容量を最適化するためにプロパティです。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用して、メソッドを呼び出すと、現在のコレクションの数とイコライズをコレクションの容量。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

MemberSignature.Value: public void TrimToSize ();
.method public hidebysig instance void TrimToSize() cil managed
Public Sub TrimToSize ()
public: void TrimToSize();
member this.TrimToSize : unit -> unit

summary.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、静的である、コレクションに含まれる項目のセットが予想される場合に特に、コレクションは、メモリのオーバーヘッドを最小限に抑えるを使用できます。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
